title: Gifts & Sets Tin by Vintage & Co Hand Cream with Shea Buttler & Mint Lip Balm
description: If you are looking for a gift to delight, take a peek at the Vintage & Co Forest Folk Hand & Lip Tin and enter the magical world of the artist, Nathalie Lete. Lip and hand essentials in an embossed keepsake tin featuring an enchanting fawn amongst forest flowers and butterflies. Find inside a pocket-size hand cream, enriched with shea butter and extracts of cornflower, black truffle and reishi mushroom, all the better for helping cherish your hands. There is also a refreshing, mint flavour lip balm with shea butter, vitamin E and extracts of birch leaf and juniper, to add a soft gleam to lips. Enjoy scents of fresh, zesty bergamot, orange blossom and jasmine, sandalwood and musks to delicate fragrance your hands Features: - Nathalie Lete designed keepsake tin containing a pocket-size hand cream with shea butter and a refreshing mint flavour lip balm, a gift sure to delight all ages. - Intensive care for dry hands when on the go, with the non-greasy, Vintage & Co - Forest Folk hand cream with skin-loving extracts of cornflower, black truffle and reishi mushroom. - Fragrance Notes: Hand cream is infused with fresh scents of bergamot, orange blossom, jasmine, sandalwood and musk, leaving hands softly scented and you with a smile. - Lip balm enriched with shea butter, vitamin E and extracts of birch leaf and juniper adds a soft gleam to lips. - Featuring a magical design with forest birds and flowers by celebrated artist, Nathalie Lete, to enchant you. Key ingredients Camellia and Rosa rugosa, rosehip oil Set includes: - Vintage & Co Hand Cream 50ml - Vintage & Co Lip Balm 10ml Certified cruelty-free and vegan by PETA.
